Hold onto your joysticks, fellow simmers! ğŸ® I'm here to spill the tea on the latest Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 Sim Update 3 Beta (v1.5.10.0). Remember how I confidently declared the last build was the final one? Well, I was officially WRONG! ğŸ˜… With two persistent known issues detailed in these new release notes, it seems the full official release is still a bit down the runway. Join me as we thoroughly dissect every detail of these fresh patch notes, covering crucial updates to navigation, autopilot, live weather, and even airport specific fixes like KDEN and LTFM. To wrap things up, we'll have an honest chat about the pros and cons of jumping into the MSFS beta program. Should you join or wait it out? Let's find out!
